# searchDirection

**Instance Property**

The direction in which to search.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var searchDirection: UIAccessibilityCustomRotor.Direction { get set }
```

## Configuring search parameters

- **currentItem**: The current element of the search.
- **UIAccessibilityCustomRotor.Direction**: Constants that indicate the search direction.
